WorkItem.Description:
Steps to reproduce (at least on my machine):
 
1. Start up Rawr
2. Load up any valid character with gear
3. In the Comparisons pane on the left, switch the view to Slot: Current Gear/Enchants/Buffs
4. Click on the Export menu and select Copy Data to Clipboard
 
Expected result:  Data is copied to the clipboard in CSV format.
Actual result: Nothing is copied to the clipboard
 
5. Click on the Export menu and select Export to CSV... and pick a file to save the data to.
 
Expected result:  File is created/updated with the data
Actual result: Error message pops up stating "Object reference not set to an instance of an object."
 
 
Note: The Export to Image... options works as expected, the other two do not.

Comments.Message: Forgot to mention that I've tested this on 2 separate machines, it only happens with v2.3.4, previous versions work just fine.
What you describe is almost certainly model specific, and probably character specific. Please post the character file you repro it with.
I guess that would be the Retribution model, the character is Silverdaemon @ Cenarius (US).
This also does not work in 2.3.5 which just came out today.
I think this should be fixed in #44876.
